Frontend Developer @ (this could be your company name! :D)

about_s.title: About me
about_s.intro1: I'm a recent grad with a degree in Computer Science & Engineering and International Studies from Korea University. My journey as a web developer began at NODAMEN, where I was responsible for the development, optimization, and bug fixing of web services. These web services showcased digital exhibitions curated by staff, allowing users to enjoy 4K digital artworks on PCs, mobile devices, and TVs.
about_s.intro2: I was also a Flutter developer responsible for developing web admin page for the content curation on mobile application, as well as development, optimizing & bug fixing of the mobile application.
about_s.intro3: My goal is to continually expand my abilities in front-end development and create impactful user experiences. You can see the projects I've worked on in the "Projects" section!

info.title: Finally, some quick bits about me.

skills_s.title: Skills
skills_s.intro: The skills, tools and technologies I am good at:

experience_s.title: Experience
experience_s.intro: Here is a quick summary of my most recent experiences:

nodamen_summary: Developed membership, personalized content, and personal pages using HTML, CSS, JS, and jQuery, improving overall website functionality and user engagement by over 30%.
Successfully integrated RESTful APIs into the front-end, enabling dynamic content delivery and realtime updates for membership subscriptions and personalized content.
Collaborated with the QC/QA team to identify and fix front-end bugs, ensuring a seamless user experience and reducing error rates by 54%.
Developed a responsive and dynamic admin page using Flutter, implementing efficient user interfaces and robust back-end integration to manage administrative tasks seamlessly
embassy_summary: Provided diagnostics and maintenance for personnel electronic devices, and assisted in the digitization of embassy services, enhancing operational efficiency and user accessibility
Developed a Telegram bot that enabled users to communicate and receive support from the embassy, facilitating over 200 user interactions each month and improving response times by 35%.
sejong_summary: Provided teaching assistance for the Advanced C Programming course, supporting the instructor and enhancing student understanding and performance.
Updated weekly labs for 30 students (8 Labs in total)
Planned and supervised midterm, final, and qualification exams, ensuring smooth execution and adherence to academic standards, resulting in a 15% improvement in student performance.

projects_s.title: Work
projects_s.intro: Some of the projects I worked on:
projects_s.patron_description: A platform for digital exhibitions curated by Nodamen's staff, allowing users to enjoy 4K digital artworks on PC, mobile and TV.
projects_s.mindsight_description: Mental health app that integrates with offline meditation projects. Users can periodically input and then assess their emotions and psychological states, providing insights through graphs. Based on this analysis, the AI recommends personalized meditation content from a library of over 5,000 resources tailored to 21 different emotional states.
projects_s.mindsight_admin_description: Admin panel for the Mindsight app, allowing the staff to manage users, content, and more.
